title: Blueprint, "Apartment House, Rue Heine, Coude Transversable", 1926
signed: Signed bottom right: Dresse par L'Architect/ soussigne/ Paris le 8 Janvier 1926
inscribed:
Inscribed bottom left: COVDE TRANSVERSABLE
Inscribed bottom: RUE HENRI HEINE
dimensions: 71.9 x 35.5 cm (28 5/16 in. x 14 in.), irregular
description: An elevation plan of the apartment building on Rue Heine. This design shows the organization of parking and storage space behind the living quarters of the apartments. Function of rooms and scale are labelled throughout the design.

tombstone.epitaph:
Blueprint, "Apartment House, Rue Heine, Coude Transversable", 1926.
1926. Blueprint. Gift of Mme. Hector Guimard. 1950-66-44.
